case.name: Transformation ending
case.description: Marinette's transformation is ending and she starts to transform away from her superhero appearance.

trigger.state: Wait, my transformation’s over already? I guess this counts for the round, doesn’t it?

case.name: Transformation ended
case.description: Marinette has lost her ladybug suit and is left in her normal clothing.

trigger.state: I wish I could just take off the mask... but, you know, magic. I’ll keep the earrings on.
Well. I'm glad I never really got into that whole "go nude under your costume" thing like Alya did.
If you thought that transformation was interesting, what if I told you that costume can adapt to its environment, too?

case.name: Marigwen Shibari
case.description: Gwen has roped up Marinette with her webs.

trigger.state: Gah! Oh my god why was that so fast, why is it so intricate, and why is it so sticky!?
